header_primary_buttons.info: “Accent 1” colors are used as fallback when these are left empty.

header_secondary_buttons.info: “Accent 2” colors are used as fallback when these are left empty.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

breadcrumbs_enabled.label: Enable breadcrumbs
breadcrumbs_enabled.info: Breadcrumbs will appear on all pages of your website, except from the home page, cart page, collections list page, 404 page, and password page.

catalog_enabled.label: Catalog mode
catalog_enabled.info: In catalog mode, no cart-related features are displayed. This even overrides individual options such as the “Add to cart” button on listings, or the “Buy buttons” block on the product page.

button_top_enabled.label: Enable scroll to top button
button_top_enabled.info: Only applies on desktop. The scroll to top button will appear on all pages of your website as soon as a visitor scrolls down the page. Clicking the button will scroll to the top of the website.

only_x_left.label: Last items threshold
only_x_left.info: When a variant's inventory is less that or equal to this number, a “Only X left” badge will appear instead of the “In Stock” badge. Set to 0 to disable.

show_items_in_stock.label: Show number of items
show_items_in_stock.info: “In Stock” badge shows the number of items in catalog and product pages, regardless of the threshold set above. Only applies on products where “Track quantity” is enabled and “Continue selling when out of stock” is disabled.

paragraph_1.content: The following options only apply when product suggestions are enabled.

paragraph_2.content: Apart from products, you may also show other types of results.

products_show_secondary_image.label: Show second image on hover
products_show_secondary_image.info: Product cards across all listings will reveal their second image on hover if it exists.

products_show_add_to_cart.label: Show “Add to cart” button
products_show_add_to_cart.info: The button will be visible on each product and on all product grids, such as on collections, related products, etc. When there are multiple variants, a “Select options” button will be shown instead.

products_two_column_mobile.label: Two columns on mobile
products_two_column_mobile.info: When “Stack on mobile” is enabled in product-listing sections, display products in two columns instead of one.

paragraph_1.content: Show currency codes after prices. Example: $1.00 USD.

paragraph_2.content: Text that follows the price when it includes taxes.

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

card_ratio.label: Card ratio
card_ratio.info: Only applies on the Grid and Slider layouts.

columns.info: Only applies on the Grid and Slider layouts.

button_color_scheme.label: Button color scheme
button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

columns.info: Only applies on the Grid and Slider layouts.

image.label: Image
image.info: Optional. The selected image will be displayed instead of the collection's image.

button_text.label: Button label
button_text.info: Optional. Use custom text for the button.

button_color_scheme.label: Button color scheme
button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

image.label: Image
image.info: Optional. The selected image will be displayed instead of the collection's image.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app.

products.label: Products
products.info: You may also select any specific products that you want displayed, instead of the ones displayed automatically by choosing a collection. In this case, the “Number of products” option is ignored.

products.label: Products
products.info: You may also select any specific products that you want displayed, instead of the ones displayed automatically by choosing a collection. In this case, the “Number of products” option is ignored.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app.

show_collection.label: Show collection card
show_collection.info: Collection card is displayed as the last item.

header-collection-card.info: Override the collection card's values by providing your own.

collection_image.label: Image
collection_image.info: Optional. The selected image will be displayed instead of the collection's image.

hide_variants.label: Hide other variants' media after selecting a variant

thumbnail_navigation.label: Show thumbnail navigation arrows
thumbnail_navigation.info: Applies on desktop only. Displays navigation arrows on products with a lot of thumbnails in the thumbnail carousel.

show_rating.label: Show rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews)

hide_single_variant.label: Hide single variant
hide_single_variant.info: In some cases, products have options (e.g. size), however only one variant is available (e.g. One size fits all). This option hides the Variant picker in these cases.

paragraph_1.content: To set complementary products, use the free Shopify “Search & Discovery” app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app.

position.label: Position
position.info: Select the positioning of the block. [Learn more](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/product-page/)

expanded.label: Start expanded
expanded.info: Blocks become expandable only when positioned on the left, and only if they have a title or an icon.

google_maps_api_key.label: Google Maps API key
google_maps_api_key.info: You'll need to enable both [Google Maps](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key) and [Geocoding](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/geocoding#GetStarted) APIs to display the map.

zoom.label: Map zoom level
zoom.info: Used only when you have one location or when navigating to a location. When there are multiple locations the map will automatically load at the optimal zoom level.

address_info_window.label: Marker info
address_info_window.info: If provided it will replace the Address label in the location's marker bubble when clicked.

inline.label: Show inline
inline.info: Disable card layout and show features inline.

image.label: Image
image.info: If none of the icons suit you, you can upload a custom 40 x 40px image.

header_1.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

svg_logo_code.label: SVG Image
svg_logo_code.info: Paste your logo's SVG image code.

header_2.info: Contact details are displayed next to the search bar.

menu_mobile.label: Mobile menu
menu_mobile.info: Optional. If left empty, it will default to the combined contents of the main and secondary menus. It is best practice to leave empty and use the same menu as desktop. [Learn more](https://developers.google.com/search/mobile-sites/mobile-first-indexing).

menu_mobile_expand_on_arrow.label: Mobile sub-menus expand on arrow click
menu_mobile_expand_on_arrow.info: If enabled only the arrows of mobile menu items will expand submenus.

header_4.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header_5.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header
enable_sticky_header.info: Header is visible on the screen as customers scroll up.

menu_font.label: Menus should use the font from

menu_item.label: Menu item
menu_item.info: Enter a first-level menu item to transform its children to a mega menu.

paragraph_1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page's featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph_2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

show_image.label: Show image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

paragraph_1.content: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)
Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: For best results, use a 1420 x 180px image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#crop-an-image)

collection_description_fullwidth.label: Make description fullwidth
collection_description_fullwidth.info: By default the description will be limited to half the available width. Enable this option to make it fullwidth.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app.

collections_per_page.label: Collections per page
collections_per_page.info: Does not apply when “Show collections” is set to “Selected”

show_product_count.label: Show search term and results count

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app.

image.label: Image
image.info: The image will be the video cover, if a video is used.

video_url.label: Video URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL
video_url.info: Leave this empty to only display the image.

layout.label: Media placement
layout.info: Only applies to desktop. In smaller screens the media will always come first.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

header_1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)

consent_checkbox.label: Enable consent checkbox
consent_checkbox.info: Require your customers to explicitly consent before subscribing with their email.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app.

columns.info: Only applies on the Grid and Slider layouts.

button_color_scheme.label: Button color scheme
button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

paragraph_1.content: Only use this section if you already have set custom recommendations for each product individually, using [product metafields](https://trulyfinepixels.com/documentation/add-custom-product-recommendations/).

paragraph_2.content: If not, you should use the “Product recommendations” section, along with the “Shopify Search & Discovery” app instead. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations).

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app.

accessibility_info.label: Slideshow description
accessibility_info.info: Describe the slideshow for customers using screen readers.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_color_scheme.label: Button color scheme
button_color_scheme.info: Applies when the button is not displayed as a link.

content_width.label: Content width %
content_width.info: Only applies on desktop. The maximum width (in percentage) of the slide’s content.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

description.label: Description
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.
